1.text: Hi pal, nice to meet you. I'm Pickles.

2.text: Who are you? Where am I? Whats happening?

3.text: Well, I just told you. I'm Pickles. Don't worry too much about the other questions. For now focus on making it to the end.

4.text: To start out with, aim your crosshair at the ceiling and press left click. See what happens and try to get over this void!

6.text: Just make sure you touch the ground before you try to swing twice.

7.text: And kid... you want answers as much as I do.
